name: Shattered (itch) (DJsquaredStudios)
description:
Shattered is a single player pseudo-2D game where you take control of a retired solider who is being hunted by his delusions from the past to his present life.

KEY NOTES:

The game contains sudden loud noises and sudden images, this is advised.

This is a student project being worked and would love to hear some feedback from you all.

This game is made in unity and is currently in developed by 4 students and is full time making on the game.
